RT @ShaneGoldmacher: NEW: Tens of millions of dollars have flooded Senate Democratic campaigns since RBG's passing. 

Nearly $3 million to Gross in Alaska. $6 million to Cunningham in NC. Sums in AZ, ME, SC, KY believed to be even bigger.
